meta.description: Real dreams from actual AI conversations - The use case that created Dreamcatcher

dreams.title: PipelineOS
dreams.description: JARVIS-like AI agent orchestration platform for development workflows

fragments.title: Original Concept - Pipeline from AI to Notion
fragments.content: Need a way to get ideas from ChatGPT/Claude into Obsidian/Notion automatically

fragments.title: Feature Drift - Agent Orchestration
fragments.content: What if instead of just capturing, we could BUILD the ideas? AI agents coordinating development

fragments.title: Self-Building Capabilities
fragments.content: PipelineOS should be able to improve itself. Builder Assistant that writes its own code

fragments.title: Production Launch
fragments.content: All phases complete. Agent engine working. Builder Assistant operational. Connex integrated.

dreams.outcome: âœ… LIVE IN PRODUCTION - All phases complete, self-building, agent swarms operational

dreams.title: Dreamcatcher
dreams.description: Browser extension and web app to capture, organize, and manage AI conversations

fragments.title: Full Circle - Back to Original Concept
fragments.content: PipelineOS grew too big. Still need the original thing: capture AI conversations

fragments.title: v2.0 UI Design
fragments.content: All Dreams gallery view, Recent Dreams sidebar, dynamic filtering and search

fragments.title: PipelineOS Integration Strategy
fragments.content: Export dreams to PipelineOS. Agents build them. Feedback loop back to Dreamcatcher.

dreams.outcome: âœ… v2.0.0 LIVE - All Dreams view working, ready for PipelineOS integration

dreams.title: FortKnoxFinance
dreams.description: Modern personal finance app inspired by MS Money, built from scratch

fragments.title: MS Money Nostalgia
fragments.content: MS Money was perfect. Modern alternatives (Mint, YNAB) don't capture the same workflow. Let's rebuild it.

fragments.title: Beautiful Landing Page
fragments.content: Need a landing page that doesn't suck. Professional, modern, converts visitors.

fragments.title: Session Management Issues
fragments.content: NextAuth session not persisting correctly. Debugging authentication flow.

fragments.title: OFX Import
fragments.content: Users need to import bank statements. Support OFX/QFX file formats.

dreams.outcome: ðŸ”„ IN PROGRESS - Auth working, database schema solid, building features

dreams.title: Connex Integration Bus
dreams.description: Nervous system connecting all applications - ERP, HRIS, LMS, CRM, CMS

fragments.title: Enterprise Suite Vision
fragments.content: Don't build separate ERP, HRIS, LMS, CRM, CMS. Build modules connected by Connex.

fragments.title: Integration with PipelineOS
fragments.content: Connex should be the communication layer for PipelineOS. All services talk through it.

dreams.outcome: ðŸ”„ IN PROGRESS - Core routing working, integrating with PipelineOS

dreams.title: Builder Assistant
dreams.description: AI agent that can build and improve itself - the brain of PipelineOS

fragments.title: Self-Building Concept
fragments.content: What if the AI could write its own code? Read the codebase, identify gaps, implement features.

fragments.title: Agent Engine PR
fragments.content: Built AgentExecutor, AgentRegistry, TaskScheduler. All working. PR auto-generated by Builder Assistant itself.

dreams.outcome: âœ… PRODUCTION - Agent Engine live, Builder Assistant operational, WROTE ITS OWN CODE

dreams.title: ShadowSurf

fragments.title: Privacy First Web
fragments.content: Modern web is surveillance capitalism. Need a tool that blocks EVERYTHING by default.
